definitions.definition: The fictional boy made from wood whose nose gets longer with each lie he tells, protagonist of the story The Adventures of Pinocchio (1881–1883) by Carlo Collodi .
The popular fairy tale about Pinocchio.

main_definition: The fictional boy made from wood whose nose gets longer with each lie he tells, protagonist of the story The Adventures of Pinocchio (1881–1883) by Carlo Collodi .
secondary_definitions: The popular fairy tale about Pinocchio.

definitions.definition: One who lies often; a liar .
One who has difficulty hiding lies.

main_definition: One who lies often; a liar .
secondary_definitions: One who has difficulty hiding lies.
